channel.title: Integrity on Greg Herlein
channel.description: Recent content in Integrity on Greg Herlein

item.title: Book Review: Extreme Operational Excellence
item.description: I finally have a book that describes my management philosophy. Two retired US Navy Submariners Officers describe how the core principles of the Submarine Service are the perfect model for excellence in the business world too.

item.title: Book Review: Operational Excellence
